title: Automated Hat Maker And Sausage Grinder (1900) Directed By Alice Guy Blaché

sources.title: Automated Hat Maker And Sausage Grinder (1900) Directed By Alice Guy Blaché
sources.description: Automated Hat-Maker and Sausage-Grinder (1900) 'Chapellerie et charcuterie mécanique' Director: Alice Guy-Blaché A machine churns out sausages on one side and spits out hats on the other.
